markdownRemark.html:
After the draw, all participants receive an email to find out who their secret friend is. In the body of the email, there's a red button that says "Find out who you got," you need to click on that button. Then, a new page will open, you click where it says "See who I got." Soon after, a box with the name of your secret friend will be displayed.

If you haven't received any emails, check your SPAM box or ask the group organizer to resend it to you within the app.

If you still can't open your mural, check the following:

  1. 1. If your browser has any issues with JavaScript. If your browser notifies you that you need to enable JavaScript, follow this step-by-step guide to do so: https://www.enable-javascript.com/pt/
  2. 2. If it could be some instability in the browser you are using. An easy way to check this problem is by trying to open the mural in another browser. Chrome and Safari are the best options.
  3. 3. If the organizer deleted the group of your secret friend in the app. In this case, it will not be possible to access the mural.
  4. 4. If your internet connection might be unstable.
If none of this solves your problem, let us know so we can find another solution!
